clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of patients with relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis

contraindications.disease: The most commonly reported adverse reactions were injection site erythema influenza like illness pyrexia headache myalgia chills injection site pain asthenia injection site pruritus and arthralgia
